languages.text: "Вы можете высказаться, но не превращайте доклад в склоку. Недопустимо, чтобы весь мостик видел, как мои офицеры пререкаются".
"You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."
languages.original_text: "Вы можете высказаться, но не превращайте доклад в склоку. Недопустимо, чтобы весь мостик видел, как мои офицеры пререкаются".

traits.locale_text: [Gesture for everyone but Abelard and Vent to step away] "You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."
[Gesture for everyone but Abelard and Vent to step away] "You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."
[Gesture for everyone but Abelard and Vent to step away] "You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."
"You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."

languages.text: “你可以发言，但我想听到的是报告，而不是大吵大闹。两名军官众目睽睽之下在舰桥上吵了起来，这是不可接受的行为。”
languages.original_text: "You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: “你可以发言，但我想听到的是报告，而不是大吵大闹。两名军官众目睽睽之下在舰桥上吵了起来，这是不可接受的行为。”

languages.text: «Puede hablar, pero quiero un informe y no griterío. Es inaceptable ver a dos de mis oficiales discutiendo en mitad del puente».
languages.original_text: "You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: «Puede hablar, pero quiero un informe y no griterío. Es inaceptable ver a dos de mis oficiales discutiendo en mitad del puente».

languages.text: 「話すのは構わないが、私は報告を聞きたいのであって、怒鳴り合いをみたいのではない。ブリッジから丸見えの状態で2人の士官が口論するのは容認できない」
languages.original_text: "You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: 「話すのは構わないが、私は報告を聞きたいのであって、怒鳴り合いをみたいのではない。ブリッジから丸見えの状態で2人の士官が口論するのは容認できない」

languages.text: "Ihr dürft sprechen, doch ich will einen Bericht hören, kein lautes Gezanke. Ein Streit zwischen zwei Offizieren mit der Brücke als Publikum ist inakzeptabel."
languages.original_text: "You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr dürft sprechen, doch ich will einen Bericht hören, kein lautes Gezanke. Ein Streit zwischen zwei Offizieren mit der Brücke als Publikum ist inakzeptabel."

languages.text: « Je vous écoute, mais j'exige un rapport en bonne et due forme, pas un concours de hurlements. Que deux officiers se chamaillent devant l'équipage est tout bonnement inacceptable. »
languages.original_text: "You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: « Je vous écoute, mais j'exige un rapport en bonne et due forme, pas un concours de hurlements. Que deux officiers se chamaillent devant l'équipage est tout bonnement inacceptable. »

languages.text: "Konuşabilirsiniz fakat karşıma bir raporla çıkın, bağırtılarla değil. Köprünün önünde iki subayın güpegündüz didişmesi kabul edilemez."
languages.original_text: "You may speak, but I want to hear a report, not a shouting match. Having two officers bickering in full view of the bridge is unacceptable."

traits.locale_text: "Konuşabilirsiniz fakat karşıma bir raporla çıkın, bağırtılarla değil. Köprünün önünde iki subayın güpegündüz didişmesi kabul edilemez."
